DataElement.preferredName: Caries Depth Surface Less Than Distance External Dental Pulp Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The decay of a tooth, in which it becomes softened, discolored, and/or porous. Depth; extent downward or inward. Surface; the extended two-dimensional outer boundary of a three-dimensional object. A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status. The space between two objects or points. Happening or arising or located outside or beyond some limits, or especially, some surface. A richly vascularized and innervated connective tissue of mesodermal origin contained in the central cavity of a tooth and delimited by the dentin. It has formative, nutritive, sensory, and protective functions. An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

The space between two objects or points. Happening or arising or located outside or beyond some limits, or especially, some surface. A richly vascularized and innervated connective tissue of mesodermal origin contained in the central cavity of a tooth and delimited by the dentin. It has formative, nutritive, sensory, and protective functions.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The decay of a tooth, in which it becomes softened, discolored, and/or porous.:Depth; extent downward or inward.:Surface; the extended two-dimensional outer boundary of a three-dimensional object.

Concepts.definition: The decay of a tooth, in which it becomes softened, discolored, and/or porous.
The extent downward or inward; the perpendicular measurement from the surface downward to determine deepness.
The extended two-dimensional outer boundary of a three-dimensional object.

Property.preferredName: Less Than Distance External Dental Pulp

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
The space separating two objects or points.
Happening or arising or located outside or beyond some limits, or especially, some surface.

A richly vascularized and innervated connective tissue of mesodermal origin contained in the central cavity of a tooth and delimited by the dentin. It has formative, nutritive, sensory, and protective functions.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The part of a tooth below the neck of the tooth which is covered by cementum.

Concepts.definition: The part of a tooth below the neck of the tooth which is covered by cementum.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The anterior portion of the head that includes the skin, muscles, and structures of the forehead, eyes, nose, mouth, cheeks, and jaw. (MeSH)

Concepts.definition: The anterior portion of the head extending from the forehead to the chin and ear to ear. The facial structures contain the eyes, nose and mouth, cheeks and jaws.
Situated farthest from a point of attachment or origin, as of a limb or bone; or directed away from the midline of the body.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: That side of the tooth facing the midline.

Concepts.definition: That side of the tooth facing the midline.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The biting surfaces of the premolar and molar teeth.

Concepts.definition: The biting surfaces of the premolar and molar teeth.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
